{{knowledge objective

|Title=Knowing the institutional tools (tabac info service)
|Description=None
|Rubric=Taking charge
|Contributors=
|Order=27}}
Telephone support: Tabac Info Service line (3989)

* Do not hesitate to refer patients to the <nowiki>http://www.tabac-info-service.fr</nowiki> websites and the 3989 free telephone line, which offer personalised coaching.

question.question: What is the main goal of the Tabac Info Service?
question.option_a: To provide free smoking cessation programs
question.option_b: To offer personalized coaching and support for patients
question.option_c: To provide information on the risks and dangers of smoking
question.option_d: To promote the sale of tobacco products
